ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been keeping an eye on Camelot.  I was intrigued that they were originally using the Rolemaster system, bards in it are pretty cool.  Have to see how much
ygData.messageBody:
I've been keeping an eye on Camelot. I was intrigued that they were
originally using the Rolemaster system, bards in it are pretty cool. Have
to see how much they have to change with the demise of ICE. I'll probably
jump to whichever MMORPG that comes out next that has bards at least as a
trial.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Daryl Schwemley [mailto:drs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 11:03 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


Hi, Kit! That's funny, I've quit twice myself and cancelled the account
both times. Anyway, the mmorpg I've got my eye on right now is Dark Age of
Camelot. I've always loved the Camelot myths and they have bardic classes.
If you haven't seen anything about it yet, check it out at
http://www.darkageofcamelot.com/ <http://www.darkageofcamelot.com/>

And as for why I started a bard, it was because I remember seeing one in
GFay when I first started playing. She was playing HoR, and I thought it
was very cool that the sparkles kept going and going and going. ;-)

Gilgurth

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 11:36 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


heh heh, twice. Both times I let friends convince me to come back. I must
say though if there were any other mmorpg's out there currently with bards I
would likely quit and at least try the other game. Not saying I wouldn't
come back, but it wouldn't be hard at this point to lure me away given the
immense frustration VI has built up in me over the last year.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:20 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


So did you cancel your account? *grin*

I'm still happy with my choice, though. The day I stop playing my Bard is
the day I stop playing EQ.

Kyri
